argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rpnnen2.1 | |- F = ( x e. ~P NN |-> ( n e. NN |-> if ( n e. x , ( ( 1 / 3 ) ^ n ) , 0 ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nnuz | |- NN = ( ZZ>= ` 1 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ZZ>= ` M ) = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) -> M e. NN ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) /\ k e. NN ) -> ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) = ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_rpnnen2lem2 | |- ( A C_ NN -> ( F ` A ) : NN --> RR ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) -> ( F ` A ) : NN --> RR ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) /\ k e. NN ) -> ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) e. RR ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) /\ k e. NN ) -> ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_1nn | |- 1 e. NN |
| 11 | 1 | #P_rpnnen2lem5 | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ 1 e. NN ) -> seq 1 ( + , ( F ` A ) ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A C_ NN -> seq 1 ( + , ( F ` A ) ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) -> seq 1 ( + , ( F ` A ) ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 14 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 9, 13 | #P_isumsplit | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) -> sum_ k e. NN ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) = ( sum_ k e. ( 1 ... ( M - 1 ) ) ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) + sum_ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) ) ) |
